tuv.seg: Crime and crime prevention
Coireacht agus a Cosc
Neighbourbood Watch is a crime prevention programme in Ireland that aims to get local communities involved in observing and reporting suspicious activities
Tá sí dírithe ar phobail áitiúla a spreagadh chun bheith ar an airdeall agus gníomhaíochtaí amhrasacha a thuairisciú chuig na Gardaí
The Community Alert programme is a community-based crime prevention, care and safety programme which aims to improve the quality of life for people in rural communities
Is éard atá sa chlár Pobal-ar-Aire ná clár pobalbhunaithe chun coireanna a chosc, agus cúram agus sábháilteacht a chur chun cinn, d’fhonn cáilíocht beatha mhuintir na tuaithe a fheabhsú
The Seniors Alert Scheme provides support to vulnerable older people to enable them to continue to live securely in their homes
Cuireann an Scéim Rabhaidh do Sheanóirí tacaíocht ar fáil do dhaoine scothaosta chun cur ar a gcumas maireachtáil go slán ina gcuid tithe
Students on campus - crime prevention
Comhairle Sábháilteachta do mhic léinn ar láthair an choláiste
Measures that students in Ireland can take to avoid becoming a victim of crime while they are on campus
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar na bealaí gur féidir le mic léinn iarracht a dhéanamh iad féin a choinneáil slán ó choireanna agus iad ar láthair an choláiste
Safety advice when motoring
Comhairle Shábháilteachta nuair a gluaisteánaíochta
Basic precautions and advice motorists in Ireland can take, to avoid becoming the victims of crime
Déanann an cháipéis seo cur síos ar na réamhchúraimí is féidir le gluaisteánaithe a dhéanamh chun a bheith cinnte nach mbeidh siad thíos le coireanna
Visitors to Ireland - crime prevention
Cuairteoirí go hÉirinn - Coireanna a Sheachaint
Precautions that visitors to Ireland can take, to avoid becoming a victim of crime
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar chuid na rudaí gur féidir le cuairteoirí go hÉirinn a dhéanamh le coireanna a sheachaint
Anti human trafficking initiative
Tionscnamh chun gáinneáil ar dhaoine a chomhrac
Ireland is one of 6 EU member states involved in an initiative against trafficking in humans
Tá Éire ar cheann de shé bhallstát an AE atá bainteach le tionscnamh i gcoinne gáinneáil ar dhaoine
As part of the initiative a blue blindfold symbol is being used to raise awareness of such activity and encourage reporting of it
Mar chuid den tionscnamh, tá siombail de dhallóg gorm á úsáid chun feasacht a ardú faoin ngníomhaíocht seo agus chun tuairisciú air a spreagadh
Anti drug dealing initiative
Tionscnamh in aghaidh mangaireacht drugaí
Dial to Stop Drug Dealing is an initiative to tackle drug dealing by providing a confidential and completely anonymous way to report drug dealing activity
Is tionscnamh é Diailigh chun Mangaireacht Drugaí a Stopadh chun tabhairt faoi mhangaireacht drugaí trí bhealach rúnda gan ainm a chur ar fáil tuairisc a thabhairt faoi mhangaireacht drugaí
Most Read in "Justice"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Dlí"
Alcohol and the law
Alcól agus an dlí
